name: Run Kitty Run (itch) (Neon Orbis)
description:
Run Kitty Run is a precision platformer where you race Kitty through an obstacle course avoiding the dangers and collecting fishy treats along the way.  

The are numerous checkpoints throughout the course and Kitty has only 10 seconds to reach each checkpoint along the way.  Missing the checkpoint due to running out of time or getting killed by a danger will take Kitty back to the previous checkpoint to try again. 

So, how many tries will it take Kitty to run through the entire course and how many Fishy Treats will Kitty bring back?  Well, that is for you to discover.  

Now, run Kitty, run!!!

Controls

  • Jump - W, X, Space
  • Move Left - A, Cursor Left
  • Move Right - D, Cursor Right
